wysiwyg_a.p: This function block implements a latch which captures the data input at the clock event and when the input data has been changed, the data output is updated and an output event is fired.

wysiwyg.p: At every 'CLK'-Event the 'D' input status is captured and compared with the value of 'Q' output. When they are not equal then 'Q' is set to 'D' and the 'EO'-Event is fired.
- If the 'D'-input value is not equal with 'Q' then
The 'Q'-output value is only set to 'D'-input when special conditions are met.
